title: (x) Precious Moments - (similar to) Ziggy Zoe {Mike Y}
content:
Do some is this a font or custom made one?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122250/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_2.gif) | 4.63 KB |

 [‹ (x) The Rohm and Haas Paint Quality Institute - ITC Garamond, custom cap {Dan}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122250/http:/typophile.com/node/14132 "Go to previous forum topic") [hand scripted "Namen für Rossoschka" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122250/http:/typophile.com/node/14137 "Go to next forum topic")
author: contohabc

comments.content:
I think the Precious Moments logo is custom lettering, but it is very close to a free font called [Ziggy Zoe](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122250/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/westwind/index.htm), which was designed by West Wind Fonts, and is now found at typOasis.

- Mike Yanega
